author: Five Binaries
title: Localize Yoroi for Czech market
description: Yoroi is missing Czech localization making it difficult to use on the local market.
solution: Provide Yoroi with a localized Czech interface. This needs to be up to date with each new Yoroi update and coordinated with translators.
experience: We have been working on localization and translation of Signal Private Messenger, Fedora Project operating system or Secure Drop.
